text: Pavetta lynesii is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Tanzania. ==Sources== * Lovett, J. & Clarke, G.P. 1998. Pavetta lynesii. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. Category:Flora of Tanzania lynesii Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Pavetta lynesii
